content: With the Flower Primes Soak equipped, using the gourd removes all Four Bane states, which can be vital to your final stretch through the game or your New Game Plus through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flower_Primes.md', within the main section titled 'Flower Primes'.
The content is as follows:
With the Flower Primes Soak equipped, using the gourd removes all Four Bane states, which can be vital to your final stretch through the game or your New Game Plus through.
